TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 179
TEI.2.document_title: Thomas M Duke to Stephen F Austin, 03-08-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: Thomas M. Duke to Austin, March 8, 1829. Asks Austin to use influence to secure augumentation of his land. This due to compensation for his sacrifices in the public service. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 179

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Thomas M. Duke to Austin, March 8, 1829. Asks Austin to use influence to secure augumentation of his land. This due to compensation for his sacrifices in the public service. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bay Prairie*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="03-08-1829">March 8, 1829*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
*/div1*
